snippet.title: The Son of Gunpowder | Hunt: Showdown
snippet.description:
Son of Gunpowder—Out now!

This DLC contains:

The Conspirator (Hunter)
Crown Cinders (Martini Henry IC1)
Royal Sabotage (Scottfield Model 3)
Forefather's Fury (Vitality Shot)

Light the fire, a plot is afoot!

https://tinyurl.com/SoGYT

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Get Hunt Showdown on Steam: https://tinyurl.com/HuntSteamYouTube

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/huntshowdown
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/huntshowdown
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/crytek
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@huntshowdownofficial
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/huntshowdown

#HuntShowdown #Hunt
